seo.title: CV Builder - Create Professional Resumes Online
seo.description: Create professional CVs and resumes with our easy-to-use online CV builder. Choose from multiple templates and customize your resume in minutes.
seo.keywords: cv builder, resume builder, professional cv, job application, career, resume templates, free cv templates, create cv fast

hero.title: Next Generation CV Creation Platform
hero.subtitle: Create AI-powered, dynamic and interactive CVs
hero.feature3: CVs in web and PDF formats

features.title: Why CV Builder?
features.subtitle: Innovative features that transform your job search process

feature1.title: Professional Templates
feature1.description: Modern and professional CV templates that impress employers

feature2.title: Easy Editing
feature2.description: Easily customize and edit your CV with a drag-and-drop interface

feature3.title: Career Development
feature3.description: Tools and recommendations to help you achieve your career goals

feature4.title: Quick Creation
feature4.description: Create a professional CV in minutes and start applying for jobs immediately

realtime.title: Real-Time Updates
realtime.description: Update your CV in real time. Got a new certificate? Add it immediately and use your updated CV for applications.

video.title: Video CV Support
video.description: Introduce yourself with a video. Show your personality and skills more effectively. The modern way to connect with employers.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get AI-powered recommendations to optimize your CV. Tailor your CV to specific job postings and increase your chances of acceptance.

analytics.title: CV Analytics
analytics.description: Track your CV's performance. Which employers viewed your profile? How many times was your CV viewed? All statistics at your fingertips.

templates.title: Professional CV Templates
templates.subtitle: Modern and impressive templates that catch employers' attention

steps.title: Create Profile

steps.title: Apply

privacy.pageDescription: Learn how we collect, use and protect your personal information at CV Builder
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how CV Builder ('we', 'our' or 'us') collects, uses and discloses your personal information when you use our service. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience while using our website and services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We may collect various types of information from and about users of our Service, including:
dataCollection.personalInfo: Personal identification information (such as your name, email address and phone number)
dataCollection.profileInfo: Profile information (such as your professional background, education, skills and other career-related information)
dataCollection.resumeData: Information contained in resumes and CVs you create using our Service
dataCollection.usageInfo: Usage details (how you interact with our Service, your access times and pages viewed)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information?
dataUsage.description: We use information we collect about you or that you provide to us for various purposes, including:
dataUsage.providingService: To provide, maintain and improve our services
dataUsage.improving: To understand and analyze how you use our Service and develop new products, services, features and functionality
dataUsage.personalizing: To personalize your experience and deliver content tailored to your interests
dataUsage.communications: To communicate with you about our Service, including service notifications and promotional messages

dataSharing.title: How We Share Your Information?
dataSharing.description: We may disclose your personal information in the following situations:
dataSharing.serviceProviders: With service providers who work on our behalf and need access to your information to perform their services
dataSharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights, privacy, safety or property, or that of our users or others
dataSharing.business: In connection with a transaction such as a merger, asset sale or bankruptcy

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. However, please note that no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
userRights.access: The right to access and review personal information we collect about you
userRights.correction: The right to correct inaccurate or incomplete information
userRights.deletion: The right to request deletion of your personal information
userRights.objection: The right to object to processing of your personal information
userRights.withdrawal: The right to withdraw your consent at any time where we rely on it to process your information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files containing small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

thirdParty.title: Third Party Services
thirdParty.description: Our Service may contain links to other websites or services that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our Service is not intended for use by children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so we can take necessary actions.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.pageDescription: Read the terms and conditions for using CV Builder services
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of CV Builder's website, services and applications (collectively 'Service'). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By creating an account or using our Service, you confirm that you have read, understood and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you are using the Service on behalf of an organization, you are agreeing to these Terms on behalf of that organization.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration and Security
accountRegistration.description: You may need to create an account to use certain features of our Service. When creating an account, you agree to:
accountRegistration.accurate: Provide accurate, current and complete information about yourself
accountRegistration.oneAccount: Maintain only one account unless expressly permitted
accountRegistration.security: Maintain security of your account by protecting your password and restricting access to your account
accountRegistration.prohibited: Not allow others to use your account or transfer your account to another person or organization

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.description: Our Service allows you to create, store and share content such as resumes, CVs and profile information ('User Content'). With respect to User Content, you agree:
userContent.ownership: You retain any intellectual property rights you hold in the User Content
userContent.license: You grant CV Builder a worldwide, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute and display the User Content to provide and improve the Service
userContent.prohibited: You will not upload, share or create any content that violates these Terms or any applicable law or regulation

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.description: We offer free and paid subscription plans for our Service. By subscribing to a paid plan, you agree to:
subscriptions.payment: Pay all fees associated with your subscription plan
subscriptions.renewal: Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless cancelled before renewal date
subscriptions.cancellation: You may cancel your subscription at any time via your account settings or by contacting us
subscriptions.refunds: Refunds are provided in accordance with our refund policy and applicable laws

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.description: The Service and its original content, features and functionality will remain the exclusive property of CV Builder and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark and other laws of your country and foreign countries. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without CV Builder's prior written permission.

prohibition.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibition.description: You agree not to use the Service in the following ways:
prohibition.illegal: That violates any applicable law or regulation
prohibition.harmful: That is harmful, threatening, abusive, defamatory or otherwise objectionable
prohibition.impersonation: That involves impersonating any person or organization or misrepresenting your affiliation with a person or organization
prohibition.data: That attempts to collect or store information about other users without their knowledge and express consent
prohibition.interference: That disrupts or interferes with the integrity or performance of the Service or its components

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may suspend or terminate your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the Service or delete your account via account settings.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranty
disclaimer.description: The Service is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose or non-infringement. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, in no event shall CV Builder, its directors, employees, partners, representatives, suppliers or affiliates be liable for any indirect, special, incidental, consequential or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, goodwill or other intangible losses.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.description: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless CV Builder and its licensors, service providers, employees, representatives, directors and board members from any claims, liabilities, damages, judgments, awards, losses, costs, expenses or fees (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of your violation of these Terms or use of the Service.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.description: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where CV Builder is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use the Service after revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

success.title: Payment Successful
success.description: Your payment has been successfully completed. Your subscription has been activated.

fail.title: Payment Failed
fail.description: A problem occurred during the payment process. Please try again later or contact our support team.
fail.notice: If you believe your account has been charged, please contact us. We will resolve the issue as soon as possible.
